features.title: SMS Integration
features.name: User Registration - SMS Integration
features.excerpt: Send SMS verifications to users after each registration; registration will be automatically approved after successful verification.

features.title: Payment History
features.name: User Registration Membership - Payment History
features.excerpt: The Payment Histories Overview feature provides users with a detailed and searchable list of all past orders and transactions, enabling easy tracking and management of their payment activities.

features.title: Coupons
features.name: User Registration - Coupons
features.excerpt: Enhance user registration with a seamless coupon add-on, offering personalized discounts and boosting engagement from day one.

features.title: Content Restriction
features.name: User Registration - Content Restriction
features.excerpt: Restrict access partially or fully to specific content, such as pages, posts, and more using advanced conditional rules.

features.title: PayPal Payment
features.name: User Registration Payments
features.excerpt: Want quick and secure payments during registration? User Registration has in-built support for the PayPal gateway.

features.title: Frontend Listing
features.name: User Registration Frontend Listing
features.excerpt: By listing registered users in the front end, your site visitors or users can view the profile of all the listed members.
